channel.title: CVE Feed for SUSE -- openSUSE Factory
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SUSE -- openSUSE Factory

item.title: CVE-2022-31251|2024-09-17T01:10:54.793Z -- suse -- opensuse%20factory
item.description: A Incorrect Default Permissions vulnerability in the packaging of the slurm testsuite of openSUSE Factory allows local attackers with control over the slurm user to escalate to root. This issue affects: openSUSE Factory slurm versions prior to 22.05.2-3.3.
